summary: The Small Business Administration works with many colleges and universities to provide entrepreneurial training on campuses. We looked into the extent to which SBA has worked with Historically Black Colleges and Universities to help people start, build, and expand businesses. We testified that SBA programs that foster entrepreneurship included, but haven't specifically targeted, these schools. We also testified that SBA has limited data on its...
title: Small Business Administration: Preliminary Observations on Efforts to Foster Entrepreneurship with Historically Black Colleges and Universities
